item.title: Papers under review
item.description: “Kernel depth measures for functional data with applications in functional outlier detection.” Joint with Alberto Mu√±oz & Gabriel Martos Submitted to: Tehcnometrics - ASA. In the last years the concept of data depth has been increasingly used in Statistics and related fields, as a center-outward ordering metric for multivariate and functional data sets. Many of the functional measures operate directly on the raw representation of the data which somehow contradicts its functional nature and also presents some weaknesses.
